name: Spirit Walker
description:
You are Spirit Walker, a being that can travel between Realms.

You must consume souls of all the beings (Humans, spirits) to win!

You can Realm Travel between the Spirit and the Real Realm, using this ability to your advantage to confuse enemies or to protect yourself.

Consuming souls will restore your health and give you more damage. Be careful when you kill a human, their angered spirit will try to attack you from Spirit Realm!

Assets used:

Kenny Free Assets: https://kenney.nl/assets?q=3d

POLYGON Western: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/historic/polygon-western-l...

Sounds: https://kenney.nl/assets?q=audio

Music: https://www.epidemicsound.com/music/genres/horror/?_us=adwords_max&_usx=15022619...

- Synthesis Malfunction, Oh the City

- Eris, Lennon Hutton
